item.title: BLOG #5: Planning a Critical Review
item.description: Film: Interstellar (2014) I. Who is narrating or telling what happens in the work? a. How is the narrator, speaker, or character revealed to readers? The story was introduced to the audience through the characteristics of the actions of a character present in the movie, Interstellar. As the story unwraps over time, Cooper as a protagonist has been seen to introduce his relationship with other characters which is done by visual and auditory techniques to pass down the information to the viewers.
